document_notes.text:
This update for keylime fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-38200: Fixed a DoS attack against it's SSL connections. (bsc#1213310)

notes.text: A flaw was found in Keylime. Due to their blocking nature, the Keylime registrar is subject to a remote denial of service against its SSL connections. This flaw allows an attacker to exhaust all available connections.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
